definition: lowest-ranked noncommissioned officer (e.g. corporal in the army or petty officer, third class in the navy)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: The corporal was cited for bravery in battle.
sentences.chinese: 那位下士因作戰英勇而受到嘉獎。

sentences.english: The rider asked the corporal why he was not helping.
sentences.chinese: 騎馬人問下士爲什麼不去幫忙。

sentences.english: Yin Mingzhu arrange corporal Kim bum to monitor Xu Darong all movements.
sentences.chinese: 尹明珠安排下士金範來監視徐大榮的所有動向。

sentences.english: Airman Dunk also got a chance to meet the stars.
sentences.chinese: 敦克下士也獲得了與明星見面的機會。

sentences.english: He was advanced to the rank of corporal.
The sergeant was injures and so the corporal took the initiative and lead the platoon out of the danger area.
sentences.chinese: 中士受傷了，因此下士主動帶領全排撤出了危險區。

sentences.english: "He was genuinely interested in what we all do," Airman Dunk said.
sentences.chinese: “他真的對我們的工作感興趣，”敦克下士說。

sentences.english: Oh, shit. - Man. Get down! Corporal, watch your left flank!
sentences.chinese: 喔，要命趴下下士，小心左翼。

sentences.english: But Corporal Locklin arrives to steal back his stallion and liberate the other horses.
sentences.chinese: 但傑森下士偷回他的種馬並釋放其他馬匹。

sentences.english: For being absent without leave, the corporal was demoted to private.
sentences.chinese: 這位下士因未經許可擅自缺席而被降爲列兵。

sentences.english: During his tour of duty, Sergeant Benko was officially credited with the destruction of 16 Japanese fighter aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 在本柯下士服役期間，他還被記載毀滅了16架敵機。

sentences.english: Corporal Palmer, does Beria Plaza mean anything to you?
sentences.chinese: 帕爾默下士，知道貝利亞廣場嗎？

sentences.english: As punishment,the corporal was demoted to private.
sentences.chinese: 作爲懲罰，這下士被降爲士兵。

sentences.english: Moralès, another corporal, tells her he will return later.
sentences.chinese: 莫拉雷斯下士告訴她，唐賀塞一會兒就回來。

definition: warrant officer/petty officer/noncommissioned officer (NCO)/Japanese military officer
junior ranking officer in Chinese army/major/lieutenant commander
middle ranking officer in Chinese army/lieutenant colonel/commander
high ranking officer in Chinese army/colonel
